data.title: Kevin Peter Hall Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Kevin Peter Hall on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Kevin Peter Hall including Predator, Predator 2, and more.
data.text:
The Price

The Enterprise hosts the negotiations for the rights to a newly discovered, stable wormhole to the Gamma Quadrant.

The Prince

When her parents refuse to send her to Europe, Brenda turns to coercion by accepting a proposal of marriage from a visiting prince.

Guess Who's Not Coming to Christmas

On Christmas Eve, Mary plans for her holiday festivities, even though scrooge-like landlord Julian ignores her invitation. However, when her family and friends cancel, Mary makes peace with Julian.

No Place Like Home

After ignoring some homeless people outside of 227 rather than helping them, Mary befriends a homeless man named Ted. With Lester's help, she tries to find work and shelter for him and his friends.

Knock It Off

When Travis finds $250,000 in the back of his limo, Julian, Dylan and Pearl take a sudden interest in him. Mobster, Mr. Bigg, holds the residents of 227 hostage until Travis hands over the loot.
